name: As We Grow Older
description:
⚠️🎧 Audio/headphones strongly recommended!

Play the role of a young raccoon trying to calm his mother by finding musical bugs hidden in the forest. This game was made in two weeks for the PIGSquad 2020 July Summer Slow Jam. 

CONTROLS

Keyboard: move (A/W/S/D), swing net (left mouse click), display bottle (hold right mouse click)

Controller: move (left joystick), swing net (bottom action button), display bottle (hold left action button)

CREATORS

Pat Farnach- Design, Development

Chamisa Kellogg - Art

Kennebec (Eric Phillips) - Music
